Articles.Content:
Roger that! thanks!

- - - Updated - - -

I may use one ship at first for my first battle. Kinda test the waters.

Since battles are turn based, you may find one ship gets wiped out before it can even move. Even the best ships are commonly destroyed in a single turn. Try three ships for your first battle.
Okay. Sounds good. Maybe I'll build one so big I have to build it in orbit or I'll use hyperedit.

After some testing, I have definitively concluded that the XL3 wheels make for abysmal armor, as they rarely stop projectiles and almost invariably summon the kraken immediately after taking damage. Now onto other armoring schemes...

Also, if we are to ban the use of the XL3 in warheads, then I believe I have a suitable fleet nearly done; I simply need a ship of intermediate (60-70 tons) size to complement the smallcraft and frigate designs.

Okay. Sounds good. Maybe I'll build one so big I have to build it in orbit or I'll use hyperedit.

Anything can be launched:p

Anything can be launched:p

zekes and at least one other person made lifters that can put 1000 tons in LKO; only Mr Tegu has actually built a warship larger than that, and even then it was far beyond the bounds of practicality. So yes, anything can be launched.
*Cough* Brahamastra *cough*
Hello everyone I'm back been off for about two months now. I just installed KSP 1.0
Protip: when fighting land battles on Duna, always make sure your weapons aren't placed too off-center, as the low (but still dangerous) gravity can be... troublesome.

zekes and at least one other person made lifters that can put 1000 tons in LKO

That'd be me too :

Was around 1500 tons in orbit cause it uses some of it's own fuel, doubt it still works now tho.
how to play?

Hello guys. I have a shiny new space fighter, all stock. Meg, despite this being my first post on this thread, I'd be willing to do a battle with you. Do you have a space fighter? It has to be all stock.

So, I've been working on my Battlecruiser...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

So, I've been working on my Battlecruiser...

http://imgur.com/a/w0kzK

Anyone else notice a resemblance to Galactica?

Anyone else notice a resemblance to Galactica?

Now that I think about it, it does kind of resemble the ships in Galactica. I guess I unconsciously took inspiration from it.
now someone just needs to build one of those weird 6 pointed Psylon things
Guys, how a about a joint ground and space battle?

Guys, how a about a joint ground and space battle?

I'm down. I'll just have to speed up production of my ground vehicles. ;D

I'm down. I'll just have to speed up production of my ground vehicles. ;D

I'm planning on launching ground to space missiles ^^

I have been lurking this thread, and its predecessors for a couple of years now. Just wondering where everybody went?

Edited July 2, 2015 by cptnoname
Autocorrect issue
I'm still around, but mostly people build and we really don't battle anymore.

Anyone got any good tanks in version 1 that are fully operable?

Edited July 2, 2015 by Jon144

Is this thread still alive? Who are the one's still active please someone answer me. I'm Back.

I've been off for 2 months and waited for the update. I back at making military ground, sea and aircraft.

Spaceships are currently being worked on. I have finally found a solution to our SHIP CORE DILEMMA (were the weakest point of the ship is the Structural beam joint and ships are mostly cut in half)

I'll show off my recent prototype involving the new "REACTIVE HULL". I want someone to test the hull using their best weapons. It's a new concept hull I want to see how effective it is. It is not equipped with my trademark "REACTIVE ARMOR" though and it is unarmed.

It's about 500 parts, I'm still working on simplifying it to reduce the part count but it's the best I've got.

Anyone got any good tanks in version 1 that are fully operable?

http://i.imgur.com/tibBkv1.jpg

*inserts TOG II*

actually, why not I'm bored, I'll go make one right now.....

Anyone got any good tanks in version 1 that are fully operable?

http://i.imgur.com/tibBkv1.jpg

I've got a few. I just have to equip with some stock munitions.

I think I'll rearm one of my Type-10 tanks.

Another option is an upgraded challenger, but I'd prefer something smaller.

Also, no, zekes. I'm not stalking you.
I think I'll make an armed train engine with extra armor. Union Locomotive Works is about to get a new craft...
